oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard of Adron Hershell Massey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Real photo postcard of Pvt. Adron Hershell Massey in uniform with overseas cap. There is a painted studio backdrop behind him and his right hand is resting on a patriotically decorated table. Massey served in Co. E, 150th Inf. Regt., 38th Division. He was from Defeated, Smith County, Tenn. and was born in May, 1895. His unit never deployed overseas and he was discharged from service in June, 1919.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Massey, Adron Hershell
World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
